title: Are energy Champions Doomed?
body:
I just feel like the deserve more. Where Champions that run on Mana always have more each time they level, plus items to give them more. Unlike energy champions I feel like they should get more each time they level up. It's hard to explain but having 200 energy e.g. Akali, the only way to get energy back is by using Q and then either using another ability to refund some energy back, this is the same for Shen and Zed for Shadows.

Should they get more energy? I think they should it will make team fighting easier for them, as well as engaging. Wish I could provide more detail but I feel like they need to have a rework or something done to them to improve them. Other Champiosn like Garen and Katarina really don't matter same goes for champions like Shyvana and Gnar generating rage/fury is easy by staying combat. It's just energy Champions I find are REALLY dependent on energy. E.g. Shen Taunt is around 100 or 110 Energy, there goes half his bar. (If he doesn't land it)

IMO they need a change.

replies.body:
> IMO they need a change.

IMO they dont.
Energy regens by itself, a lot faster than mana... I don't see a need to increase/change the speed at which it regenerates. I do think some champions energy costs (Shen) need to be tweaked a little bit.
It's to take more out of free sustained dmg without trading for it. It's a no from me
Wait.. you don't think zed and lee are spammable enough already?
Shen needs tweaks, but the rest are fine.

Idk man, remember those 2 broken as shiet energy champ some time ago? 

Yeah, Lee and Zed (oh and Akali, but in a different way).

I don't think energy champ is having it that bad.

The point of energy is to encourage all-ins, they're supposed to suck when they fail the engage it's just how it is. And when they do succeed, oh man.
